name: zinc.world
description: Vlad Zinculescu, a designer who codes and ♥️ the web.

scripts.dev: npm run clean && eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i css/main.css -o css/main.min.css --watch
scripts.debug: npm run clean && DEBUG=Eleventy* eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i css/main.css -o output/css/main.min.css --watch

author: Vlad Zinculescu
